delete.name: delete
delete.description: Delete a job, by job id.

release.name: release
release.description: Release a reserved job back into the ready queue.

bury.name: bury
bury.description: Bury a job, by job id.

touch.name: touch
touch.description: Touch a job, by job id, requesting more time to work on a reserved job before it expires.

stats_job.name: stats
stats_job.description: Return a dict of stats about a job, by job id.

kick_job.name: kick
kick_job.description: Kick a specific job into the ready queue.

put.name: put
put.description: Put a job into the current tube. Returns job id.

reserve_with_timeout.name: reserve
reserve_with_timeout.description: Reserve a job from one of the watched tubes, with optional timeout in seconds. Returns a Job object, or None if the request times out.

reserve.name: reserve
reserve.description: Reserve a job from one of the watched tubes, with optional timeout in seconds. Returns a Job object, or None if the request times out.

peek.name: peek
peek.description: Peek at a job. Returns a Job, or None.

peek_ready.name: ready
peek_ready.description: Peek at next ready job. Returns a Job, or None.

peek_delayed.name: delayed
peek_delayed.description: Peek at next delayed job. Returns a Job, or None.

peek_buried.name: buried
peek_buried.description: Peek at next buried job. Returns a Job, or None.

list_tubes.name: tubes
list_tubes.description: Return a list of all existing tubes.

using.name: using
using.description: Return the tube currently being used.

watching.name: watching
watching.description: Return a list of all tubes being watched.

stats_tube.name: stats
stats_tube.description: Return a dict of stats about a given tube.

pause_tube.name: pause
pause_tube.description: Pause a tube for a given delay time, in seconds.

stats.name: stats
stats.description: Return a dict of beanstalkd statistics.

kick.name: kick
kick.description: Kick at most bound jobs into the ready queue.
